__e: Best thing you could do for your boss-- protect him from himself.

If my son is still here, if there's still a part of him standing here in front of me, then he'll put these on willingly and he'll come with me, because he knows I'm here to protect him from himself and from others.
he's been doing everything he could to shield him from this world, and now he's out here in the thick of it.
I was supposed to protect him, and now I might have killed my little brother.
And I think she was trying to protect him, which is what a good sister does.
The NYPD can protect you, and if someone really is trying to kill you, you're a lot safer in here with us than out there, on your own.
